title: EndeavourOS
desc:
# EndeavourOS

EndeavourOS is an Arch Linux-based distribution that aims to provide a straightforward and user-friendly experience for installing and using Arch Linux. It offers a minimalistic installation that allows users to build their Arch Linux system with their preferred desktop environment and software.

Features

  • Graphical Installer: EndeavourOS includes a graphical installer that simplifies the Arch Linux installation process for users who may find the traditional Arch installation daunting.
  • Rolling Release Model: Similar to Arch Linux, EndeavourOS follows a rolling release model, ensuring users receive timely updates.
  • Choice of Desktop Environments: Users can choose from various desktop environments during installation, allowing for customization.

Pros and Cons

Pros:
1. Graphical installer
2. Rolling release model
3. Choice of desktop environments

Cons:
1. Limited handholding
2. Smaller community compared to Arch and Manjaro
